changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE TRIGGER tgr_locationinfo_trash AFTER DELETE ON t_locationinfo REFERENCING OLD ROW old FOR EACH ROW WHEN (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_inodes WHERE ipnfsid = old.ipnfsid)) INSERT INTO t_locationinfo_trash VALUES (old.ipnfsid, old.itype, old.ilocation, old.ipriority, old.ictime, old.iatime, old.istate)
